As the game progresses, pairs of players occasionally swap positions. First, Alice and Claire trade positions. Then, Claire and Bob trade positions. Finally, Bob and Alice trade positions. At the end of the match, Alice is playing
Options:
(A) right winger
(B) cheerleader
(C) striker
prediction_CoT_turbo: At the start of the match, Alice is playing right winger, Bob is playing cheerleader, and Claire is playing striker. Then, Alice and Claire trade positions, so Alice is now playing striker and Claire is playing right winger. Next, Claire and Bob trade positions, so Claire is now playing cheerleader and Bob is playing right winger. Finally, Bob and Alice trade positions, so Bob is now playing striker and Alice is playing right winger again. Therefore, at the end of the match, Alice is playing right winger. So the answer is (A) right winger.
prediction_SC_turbo: At the start of the match, Alice is playing right winger, Bob is playing cheerleader, and Claire is playing striker. After Alice and Claire swap places, Alice is in the striker position and Claire is at the right winger position. After Claire and Bob swap places, Claire moves to the cheerleader position and Bob moves to the right winger position. Finally, after Bob and Alice swap places, Alice moves back to the right winger position and Bob moves to the striker position. So the answer is (A) right winger.

Finally, Bob and Alice swap positions, which means Alice returns to her initial position as the right winger, while Bob becomes the striker.

Therefore, at the end of the match, Alice is playing the right winger position, which is option (A). So the answer is (A) right winger.
